ACT
218
Calling with an ad
If it is not known whether there is an heir, the court shall, by means of an advertisement, invite the persons who claim the inheritance to report to the court within six months from the publication of the advertisement in the "Narodne novine".
The advertisement will be nailed to the notice board of the court and published in the "Narodne novine" and in another suitable way.
According to the provisions of paragraphs 1 and 2 of this article, the court will also proceed if the heir is appointed a temporary representative because the heir's residence is unknown and the heir does not have a proxy, or because the heir or his legal representative, who do not have a proxy, , are located abroad or are unavailable, and the delivery could not be made.
After the deadline referred to in paragraph 1 of this article has passed, the court will conduct a probate hearing based on the statement of the appointed guardian and the information available to the court.
